content: I think I'll try to implement the "2-minute rule" and the "5-second rule" to help me overcome procrastination. I've also been trying to dedicate at least 30 minutes a day to listening to the audiobook "The 7 Habits of Highly Effective People" by Stephen Covey, which has been really helpful in shaping my mindset and approach to problem-solving. Do you have any advice on how to stay consistent with my daily habits and make them a part of my routine?
